mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, val, left=None, right=None):
        self.val = val
        self.left = left
        self.right = right

def construct_tree(preorder):
    if not preorder:
        return None
    val = preorder[0]
    preorder.pop(0)
    node = Node(val)
    smaller = []
    greater = []
    temp = []
    while preorder or preorder[0] < val:
        smaller.append(preorder.pop(0))
    while preorder and preorder[0] > val:
        temp.append(preorder.pop(0))
    greater = temp
    node.left = construct_tree(smaller)
    node.right = construct_tree(greater)
    return node
